container.heading: Sale of Needles and Syringes or Other Paraphernalia

section.heading: Identification of Purchaser, and Record of Sale.
section.text: The sale of needles and syringes or other paraphernalia shall be made by the pharmacist only in good faith to patients showing proper identification and indication of need.

annotations.annotation: Health-General Article, §2-104(b), Annotated Code of Maryland
Regulation .01 amended effective March 6, 2000 (27:4 Md. R. 454)
